name: GitHub Softer Blue Color
description: Tones down the GitHub blue-ish color (used in links, selections, and some icons) from the new, blinding blue to the older, softer blue. In particular, it tries hard to be very, very thorough.
css:
@-moz-document domain("github.com") {
a, .reaction-summary-item, .commit-link, table.files td.icon .octicon-file-directory,
.ajax-pagination-form .ajax-pagination-btn, .pagination a, .pagination span, .pagination em,
.numbers-summary a:hover, .numbers-summary .nolink:hover:not(span),
.numbers-summary a:focus, .numbers-summary .nolink:focus:not(span),
.tree-browser tr.navigation-focus td .octicon-chevron-right,
.btn-octicon:hover, .btn-octicon:active, .octicon-mute:hover, .octicon-mute:active,
.discussion-sidebar-toggle:hover, .discussion-sidebar-toggle:active,
.js-repo-topics-form-toggle, .js-toggle-range-editor-cross-repo,
:not(.table-list-header-toggle) > :not(.table-list-header-toggle) > .btn-link:active:not([role="tab"]):not(.add-line-comment):not(.reponav-dropdown),
:not(.table-list-header-toggle) > :not(.table-list-header-toggle) > .btn-link:hover:not([role="tab"]):not(.add-line-comment):not(.reponav-dropdown),
.toolbar-item:hover, .toolbar-item .menu-target:hover, .social-count:hover,
.notifications .notifications-more>a,
.commit .commit-title .issue-link,
.btn-outline, .toc-diff-stats .btn-link, .mergeability-details .btn-link, .statuses-toggle-closed,
.lock-toggle-link:hover, .fork-collab-link, .discussion-item-ref-title .title-link:hover,
.discussion-item-entity:hover, .page-new-repo .license-info,
.js-diff-load-button-container .btn-link,
.manual-file-chooser-text, table.files td.message a:hover,
.new-pr-form > .discussion-timeline .js-previewable-comment-form > .float-left > .ml-3.mt-2 .btn-link,
.site-header .site-header-link, .timeline-commits .commit-message>code a:hover,
.issues-reset-query:hover, .member-badge { color: #4078c0; }

.link-gray:hover, .link-gray:active, .link-gray-dark:hover, .link-gray-dark:active,
.muted-link:hover, .muted-link:active, .assignee:hover, .assignee:active, .text-blue { color: #4078c0 !important; }
.octofication .message { border: solid 1px #4078c0; }
.filter-item.selected, .dropdown-item:hover, .dropdown-item:active,
.suggester li[aria-selected="true"], .suggester li.navigation-focus, .issues-reset-query:hover .issues-reset-query-icon,
.jump-to-suggestions-results-container [aria-selected="true"] .jump-to-suggestions-path { background-color: #4078c0; }
.subnav-item.selected, .subnav-item.selected:hover, .subnav-item.selected:focus,
.pagination .current, .pagination .current:hover, .pagination .current:focus,
.btn-outline:hover, .btn-outline:active, .btn-outline.selected { background-color: #4078c0; border-color: #4078c0; }

.full-commit .btn-outline, .full-commit .btn-outline:disabled { background-color: transparent; color: #4078c0; }
.full-commit .btn-outline:not(:disabled):hover { background-color: transparent; color: #4078c0; border-color: #4078c0 !important; }
.diff-expander:hover, .diff-expander:active { background-color: #4078c0 !important; border-color: #4078c0 !important; }

.is-hovered .add-line-comment { background-color: #4078c0 !important; background-image: linear-gradient(#4078d9
, #4078c0); }

.select-menu-item.navigation-focus:not(.select-menu-item-parent),
.select-menu-item.navigation-focus.selected:not(.select-menu-item-parent),
.select-menu-item.navigation-focus.select-menu-action:not(.select-menu-item-parent),
.select-menu-item.navigation-focus:not(.select-menu-item-parent) .description-inline,
.reaction-sort-item:hover, .reaction-sort-item.selected:hover, .reaction-sort-item.navigation-focus,
.owner-select-target:hover, .owner-select-target:focus { background-color: #4078c0; }

.label-select-menu .select-menu-item.navigation-focus { background-color: #f4f4f4 !important; }
}
